productName: The Aristocats fabric nursery bag for girls
productDescription:
This satchel was made in a thick pink cotton fabric and a cotton fabric with a delightful Aristocats pattern. Its flap is accessorized with coordinated satin and organza ribbons and finished with a coordinated edging for a perfect finish.
It is fully lined in a thick ecru canvas which gives it a lot of hold.
A small pocket plated on the front accommodates a satchel clasp that is easily handled by small hands.

Its dimensions are adapted to the body shape of toddlers (28 cm x 24 cm x 5cm).
Its handles are adjustable from 50 to 60 cm

This satchel is a unique Cicilounette creation. It has been made with the greatest care in fabrics chosen for their beauty and quality.
The first name can be written on simple request
Satchel made from thick fabric. Flap worked in a coated cotton fabric with a schoolboy motif and finished with coordinated piping.

This delightful little pouch-shaped backpack has been crafted in a coordinated combination of fabrics: the flap is made from a cotton fabric with a small bolides motif. The bag is sewn in a thick brown fabric. It is fully lined in a thick ecru fabric for impeccable wear. Its small front pocket has a Velcro fastening. Inside cord closure.

The bag is sewn in a thick brown fabric. It is fully lined in a thick ecru fabric for impeccable wear. Its small front pocket has a Velcro fastening. Inside cord closure.
